English: I eat a lot of fruit.
Literally: An apple a day keeps the doctor away., Eating enough fruit will keep you from getting sick.
Hungarian: Egy alma naponta távol tartja az orvost.

English: Literally: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree., Children often take after their parents.
Hungarian: Az alma nem esik messze a fájától.

English: Literally: By its fruits a tree is known., A person is known through their accomplishments.
